summary: This document contains a summary of account transactions for a Deutsche Bank account, detailing deposits, withdrawals, and transfers for the month of May 2014. It highlights significant transactions, including large transfers to and from various accounts, and provides instructions for addressing potential errors in the account statement.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Account Transactions Summary
events.description: Summary of account transactions for May 2014, including significant transfers and account balance changes.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $408,234.66 on May 1, 2014.
A total of $10,000,000.00 was transferred out to Northbrook Bank and Trust on May 2, 2014.
The account received an incoming transfer of $6,762.65 from Bear Stearns Asset Management on May 8, 2014.
On May 12, 2014, another $4,000,000.00 was transferred out to First National Bank of Omaha.
The ending balance as of May 31, 2014, was $414,997.57.
